params.id: the token type of which to get the balance of.

params.newAdmin: The address of the new administrator.

params.newBouncerAdmin: address of the new minting administrator.

params.id: the token to get the index of.

whether the id is a collection.

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Should be callable only by MintableERC1155Predicate Make sure minting is done only by this function

params.account: user address for whom token is being minted
params.data: extra byte data to be accompanied with minted tokens
extra data to accompany the minting call

params.id: the token id for which the next collection index is fetched.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: call data should be optimized to order ids so packedBalance can be used efficiently.

params.from: address from which tokens are transfered.
params.ids: ids of each token type transfered.
params.to: address to which the token will be transfered.
params.values: amount of each token type transfered.

params.from: address from which tokens are transfered.
params.to: address to which the token will be transfered.

params.operator: address which will be granted rights to transfer all tokens of the caller.
address which will be granted rights to transfer all token owned by `sender`.

params.bouncer: address that will be given/removed minting bouncer rights.
params.enabled: set whether the address is enabled or disabled as a minting bouncer.

params.predicate: address that will be given minting rights for L1.

params.enabled: set whether the superOperator is enabled or disabled.
params.superOperator: address that will be given/removed superOperator right.

params.id: the interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165.
token to get the uri of.

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of `owner` for the token type `id`.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of `owners` for each token type `ids`.

changeBouncerAdmin(address).notice: Change the minting administrator to be `newBouncerAdmin`.

collectionIndexOf(uint256).notice: Gives the index at which an NFT was minted in a collection : first of a collection get the zero index.

collectionOf(uint256).notice: Gives the collection a specific token belongs to.

getBouncerAdmin().notice: Returns the current administrator in charge of minting rights.

initialize(address,address,address,uint8.notice: fulfills the purpose of a constructor in upgradeable contracts

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of `operator` for owner `owner`.

isBouncer(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given minting bouncer rights.

isCollection(uint256).notice: Return wether the id is a collection

isSuperOperator(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given superOperator rights.

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Creates `amount` tokens of token type `id`, and assigns them to `account`.

mintBatch(address,uint256[],uint256[],by.notice: called by predicate to mint tokens transferred from L2

name().notice: A descriptive name for the collection of tokens in this contract.

prepareForExtract(address,uint256,addres.notice: Call to perform all AssetERC1155 operations before minting to AssetERC721.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Transfers `values` tokens of type `ids` from  `from` to `to` (with safety call).

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers `value` tokens of type `id` from  `from` to `to`  (with safety call).

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for `operator` to manage all of the caller's tokens.

setApprovalForAllFor(address,address,boo.notice: Enable or disable approval for `operator` to manage all `sender`'s tokens.

setBouncer(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable the ability of `bouncer` to mint tokens (minting bouncer rights).

setPredicate(address).notice: Set address which will have minting privelages on L1 which is currently limited to tunnels.

setSuperOperator(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable the ability of `superOperator` to transfer tokens of all (superOperator rights).

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements interface `id`.

symbol().notice: An abbreviated name for the collection of tokens in this contract.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: A distinct Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given asset.
